content: invisibly or join with a slip_stitch in 2nd st and cut yarn 32 treble_crochet 8 double_crochet 24 half_double_crochet 40 single_crochet 4 chain-2 r14 dark 2 double_crochet chain-2 2 double_crochet in corner chain space bpdc around next 26 st repeat from beginning all around fasten_off invisibly or join with a slip_stitch in 2nd st and cut yarn 16dc 104 bpdc 4 chain-2 r15 light single_crochet chain-2 single_crochet in corner chain space skip next 3 st 6 double_crochet in next st skip next 2 st *single_crochet in next st skip next 2 st 6 double_crochet in next st skip next 2 st** repeat from * to ** three times more repeat from beginning all around fasten_off invisibly or join with a slip_stitch in chain space and cut yarn 24 single_crochet 120 double_crochet 4 chain-2 8 r16 medium 3 double_crochet chain-2 3 double_crochet in corner chain space skip next 2 st including hidden st single_crochet blo in next 4 st *skip next st 2 double_crochet blo in next st the single_crochet skip next st single_crochet blo in next 4 st ** repeat from * to ** 3 times more skip last 2 st repeat from beginning all around fasten_off invisibly or join with a slip_stitch in chain space and cut yarn 24 treble_crochet 80 single_crochet blo 32 double_crochet blo 4 chain-2 r17 dark 2 double_crochet chain-2 2 double_crochet in corner chain space double_crochet in next 34 st repeat from beginning all around fasten_off invisibly or join with a slip_stitch in chain space and cut yarn 152dc 4 chain-2 final stitch count per side 38 double_crochet + corner chain-2 finished design copyright notice please do not share this pattern in any form online by email or in print you are welcome to make any changes and to use finished items in any way you like but if displayed online or offered for sale please include an acknowledgement and/or link to the original pattern page on ravelry please do not claim it as your own design thank you j 9 optional extra round for block-a-month crochet-along 2023 join in here if you like you can add more texture and a more floral vibe to moonshadow to fit in better with this year s earlier designs it s easy to add the round of petals as surface crochet once the square is complete 10 before you start place stitch markers as shown above 1 and 4 in the chain-3 spaces in r9 these spaces are the middle ones of three worked between two trebles 2 and 5 around the hdcs in r14 and 3 and 6 in the top of the stitches in r11 ignore all stitches and chain spaces not specifically mentioned check with the photo on page 9 as you go along to make sure the stitch placements look right 6 double_crochet in marked chain space 1 fpsc around marked stitch 2 6 double_crochet in same chain space 1 chain-1 single_crochet in marked stitch 3 chain-1 6 double_crochet in marked chain space 4 fpsc
